EmailTemplate.name: Inbound Web 2nd voicemail
EmailTemplate.subject: Checking in from VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
I just wanted to check in to make sure you are finding VMTurbo's virtual appliance useful.
If you have any questions or feedback, please let me know. We really appreciate your interest in VMTurbo, and we hope to hear from you.
Thanks,
{!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName}
Phone: 781.373.3540 ~ Fax: 781.373.3257 Top 10 Reasons to Choose VMTurbo - http://tiny.cc/4kmu4
